page.title: 11LIFE STYLES
page.content: Gareth Jones is nine years old.He lives on Bodwen estate in Gellifor.He has one sister called Sioned who is five years old.Every morning Gareth gets up at about seven o'clock,watches television before going for a wash and have breakfast.His favourte breakfast is Frosties cereal,toast and a drink of tea.He sets out for school at about half past eight.When he gets there he plays football or talks to his friends.At nine o'clock school starts. His favourite lessons are P.E and maths.During playtime and lunchtime he likes to play football with his friends Huw,Michael,Sam and Andrew.He has dinner in school and his favouite dinner is sausage, beans and chips, with ice cream and jelly for pudding. After school,Gareth plays on his BMX bike,goes for walks,or watches his favourite TV programme,Airwolf.
